scenes.text: *HISS1* Agents... can you hear me? Good...This place matches up with the plan but this is new? The whole of the Mulho-land kingdom seems to be wired up with redstone controlled passages and gates.See how you get on with the circuit ahead.

Surface level... perfect!

From the looks of things the gate seems to be the only place we can go from here, and my maps have not updated yet.

I'll get back to you when this loads but see how you get on! Good luck Agents.

The market quarter... and interesting route choice but i'll not doubt you...

Looks like this is the same issue, all the blasted gates are down!

Can you and your team program in the correct redstone combination?

Ha HA! The Castle entrance!

Now, that door doesn't look like it's going to open easily... I'll see what I can do.

Can you and your team break through the door using the correct redstone combination?

The Castle atrium... Wait a moment, this is where the Crown is stored!

Can you and your team get the crown and break out? I have a feeling you can't go back the way you came in...

Keep me updated on your location Agent!

Ah ha! The banquet room... hmmmm...

From my intel, I believe the large door in front is double layered, first a locked door, then a gate.

If I get the oustide gate raised, can you get the door unlocked and get through?

You have made it out of the castle!

Now just the final gate that leads to the forest, at that point you are home free!

See if you can solve this final redstone logic puzzle.
